```{r, include=FALSE}

# set up -----------------------------

library(RPostgreSQL)

library(rdaCharts)
library(stringr)
library(htmltools) 
library(htmlwidgets)
# remotes::install_github("jthomasmock/gtExtras")
library(gtExtras)
library(gt)
library(extrafont)
library(usethis)

#connect to postgres

source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")

con <- connect_to_db("eci_fresno_ripa")

# pull analysis tables for visualizing

df<-dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM report_traffic_result_citation_license_race")%>%
    mutate(statute_literal_25 = "Driving Without a License")%>% # convert text for offense to be title case
  mutate(race_label=case_when(
    race == "latinx" ~ "Latinx",
    race == "nh_aian" ~ "AIAN NH",
    race == "nh_black" ~ "Black",
    race == "nh_multiracial" ~ "Multiracial",
    race == "nh_nhpi" ~ "NHPI NH",
    race == "nh_sswana" ~ "SSWANA NH",
    race == "nh_white" ~ "White",
    race == "aiain_aoic" ~ "AIAN",
    race == "nhpia_aoic" ~ "NHPI",
    race == "sswana_aoic" ~ "SWANA/SA",
    race == 'nh_asian' ~ "Asian", 
    .default = race)) %>%
  filter(race!="nh_sswana") %>%
  arrange(-rate)

# Pull out the result denominator for visualizing
df_result<-df%>%
  filter(denom=="citation_result")

```

```{r, include=FALSE}

# visualize--------------------------

# create caption 

sourcenote<-"Catalyst California calculations based on City of Fresno's Police Stop Data (2022), catalystcalifornia.org, 2024. "

methodnote <- "Analysis for all officer-initiated traffic stops made by officers in 2022 that resulted in a citation for infraction."

racenote <- "Race/ethnicity: AIAN=American Indian or Alaska Native, NHPI=Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander, SWANA/SA=Southwest Asian (Middle Eastern) or North African, or South Asian."

caption_text <- paste("<br>", racenote, sourcenote, methodnote)

# create tooltip text

tooltip_text <- "Out of 100  <b>{point.statute_literal_25}</b> citations given out by Fresno PD, <b>{point.rate:.1f}%</b> were given to people perceived as <b>{point.race_label}</b>, or a total of <b>{point.count:.1f}</b> people cited."

  
# add factors for sorting
df_result <- within(df_result, race_label <- factor(race_label, levels=c("White","SWANA/SA", "Asian","Black", "Latinx")))


chart<-rdaStackedBar(
  df_result,
 x=statute_literal_25,
  y="rate",
  z=race_label,
 theme="theme_fbhc",
  title = "Fresno PD gives 75% of their Citations for Driving Without a License to People of Color",
  subtitle = "Percent of people ticketed for driving without a license by perceived race",
  tooltip_text = tooltip_text,
  caption = caption_text,
  export_data_label = list(pointFormat='{point.rate:.1f}%') 
)

```
